title: So-called Grotta Fragapane
description: A large and rich Early Christian necropolis on the Via Sacra in Agrigento, dated to the fourth century A.D.

properties.description: Location of the so-called Grotta Fragapane, on the Via Sacra in Agrigento, based on a representative point derived from an OpenStreetMap node.
properties.title: OSM location of the so-called Grotta Fragapane
